entry.title: PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27
entry.content:
With more than 100 startups incubated in a general and multi-disciplinary ecosystem, PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27 is a Parisian incubator offering both a flexible hosting and support services, but also a rich and inspiring infrastructure, like a natural greenhouse where knowledge flourishes.

The Info Box Â 
ğŸ¢ Incubator Name PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27
ğŸŒ Location Paris, France
ğŸ° Size 3500 m2 of offices, 100 m2 of common areas
+ gym room, relaxation area, â€¦
ğŸ”¢ Startups incubated 100
ğŸ› The â€œPetit plusâ€ PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27 is labeled â€œParis Innovationâ€ by the City of Paris
+ Access to the â€œPIAâ€ (Paris Innovation AmorÃ§age) funding program
ğŸ’µ Price Starting at 250â‚¬/month

Whatâ€™s more inspiring than a natural-looking greenhouse with an important infrastructure and quality accommodation, all in the heart of Paris ? Powered by the Paris Innovation label, PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27 is the ultimate friendly incubator with nearly 4 million euros raised by only 8 startups of the incubator.

In this friendly ecosystem, you have the choice between open or closed offices according to your needs, with a large common area free co-working, a waiting room, 9 meeting rooms fully equipped and relaxation areas (gym, patio). The team is composed of only 10 people with always a presence in the HQ.

An accompanying offer

Providing to startups an offer of hosting to work is something great, but an incubator would not be an incubator if it did not offer a continuous support. Thus, PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27 offers business workshops, networking meetings, conferences, networking with experts in your field, as well as an access to a social platform bringing together all incubated startups.

PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27 offers 3 programs for startups. Offices open starting at 560â‚¬/month (+ fees) or private (starting at 680â‚¬/month + fees) with the possibility of joining the Associate Program, allowing you to get :

  • A postal address at 27 rue du Chemin Vert (Paris 75011) with the management of your receptions and mailings stamped.
  • A permanent access badge to the premises (24h/24 and 7/7)
  • An access to the meeting rooms for the reception of your customers (according to availability)
  • A permanent access to the gym room
  • An access to the cafeteria
  • A profile of your company on the PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27â€™s intranet (news feed, events, meeting rooms booking, chat, â€¦)

Certified Paris Innovation by the City of Paris

As a Paris Innovation certified incubator by the Paris City Hall, startups located in PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27 can apply for a funding with Paris Innovation AmorÃ§age funding program. Created to support the development of startups hosted in incubators labeled Paris Innovation, it is aimed at any innovative project in the seed or development phase. Do not hesitate to consult the detailed presentation of this program and to contact, as the case may be, the Paris Regional Office of Bpifrance Ãle de France.

To learn more about PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27, the reception is open from 9am to 6:30pm, if you want to have a preview of the atmosphere and the place, donâ€™t hesitate to go there. Itâ€™s only 5 minutes from the Place de la Bastille !

ğŸŒ Contact ğŸŒ
PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27
27 Rue du chemin vert
75013 Paris
+33 (0)1 75 77 87 00
contact@pepiniere27.fr
entry.summary: With more than 100 startups incubated in a general and multi-disciplinary ecosystem, PÃ©piniÃ¨re 27 is a Parisian incubator offering both a flexible hosting and support services, but also a rich and inspiring infrastructure, like a natural greenhouse where knowledge flourishes.

entry.title: NUMA
entry.content:
Not just an open space for entrepreneurs, NUMA is an international hub of more than 300 organizations, including CAC40 leaders and hundreds of startups. Training and follow-up are at the heart of NUMAâ€™s philosophy.

The Info Box Â 
ğŸ¢ Incubator Name NUMA
ğŸŒ Location Paris, France
ğŸ”¢ Startups incubated 300
ğŸ› The â€œPetit plusâ€ NUMA offers a free open-space with bar on the ground floor
ğŸ’µ Price Free co-working space
Privatization of rooms from 1200â‚¬/day

It all started in 2000 with Silicon Sentier, an entrepreneur association with more than 180 partner companies. Their initial objective was to encourage meetings between entrepreneurs and to allow new projects to emerge and floor on the Next Big Thing. The idea was to design a network capable of promoting and facilitating the development of entrepreneurship at the national level, and thatâ€™s what became NUMA today.

NUMA is not only an open space for entrepreneurs or small businesses today, itâ€™s a hub of more than 300 organizations, including CAC40 leaders and hundreds of startups - with a presence in Paris, Barcelona, Mexico, Toulouse, Berlin and even New York.

Not only an open-space

The first time I went to NUMA, it was just to have a place where to discuss professionally with other students, entrepreneurs and business leaders, I also discovered a free space co-working on the ground floor, with possibility to rent different rooms for private meetings.

But my biggest surprise was to discover the â€œformationsâ€. Today, the challenge is not only to master the technical aspect of a project but also the notions of management, intrapreneurship, design thinking and digital marketing. And guess what? Thatâ€™s exactly what NUMA offers. In fact, we understand quickly that we do not invest only in a HQ or a place to work, but in a long-term support of your project.

â€œTo infinity and beyondâ€

Regarding the incubation program, NUMA brings its expertise to startups already on the market and having a consequent turnover, for 3.5 % equity participation. NUMAâ€™s philosophy is based on the development of the startupsâ€™ business and network, the implementation of a rigorous and effective methodology for executing their strategy as well as long-term support through a mentoring system with experts.

Looking for something fun to do there, to discover the atmosphere of NUMA ? Do not hesitate to visit â€œLa Cantineâ€, the first collaborative workspace created in Ãle-de-France Region, where many celebrities have passed to make conferences and exchange with members, like Mark Zuckerberg.

ğŸŒ Contact ğŸŒ
NUMA Paris
39 Rue du Caire
75002 Paris
+33 (0)1 40 13 64 40
entry.summary: Not just an open space for entrepreneurs, NUMA is an international hub of more than 300 organizations, including CAC40 leaders and hundreds of startups. Training and follow-up are at the heart of NUMAâ€™s philosophy.
